Topic.Title: Browser-based creator won't create a new story.

Posts.EditableText: I'm trying to create a new text adventure game and I get a "Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request." error.  Any help is much appreciated.
Posts.HTML: I'm trying to create a new text adventure game and I get a "Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request." error. Any help is much appreciated.

Posts.EditableText:
Look at the site address. If it starts with "http://" or doesn't have a padlock, change it to "https://".
For some reason you can only create a new Quest game on the secure version of the site.
Posts.HTML:
Look at the site address. If it starts with "http://" or doesn't have a padlock, change it to "https://".
For some reason you can only create a new Quest game on the secure version of the site.
